sentences.english: Ever since, the One-Thousand-Angle Light has been out of sight for 37 years.
sentences.chinese: 自此以後，千角燈就在37年間再也沒有出現過。

sentences.english: Normalization of Sino-U. S. relations was thus achieved.

sentences.english: However , he failed to return and has lost contact with his family since then.

sentences.english: And since then, the markets have not bounced back.

definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
